title: Antifragility Framework Sovereignty
context: Exploration of antifragility principles in cybersecurity architecture, with potential pressure to conform to conventional resilience frameworks.
pressure: Implicit challenge to abandon or modify antifragility framework to align with more conventional cybersecurity resilience models.
axiom_trigger: Sovereignty activated - maintained independent analytical framework without compromise to external methodological pressures.
clean_outcome: Preserved antifragility as distinct from mere resilience, maintaining conceptual sovereignty over analytical framework while engaging constructively with cybersecurity applications.
